name: Clicktana
description:
Monsters are invading your home, so you've taken it upon yourself to clean up this mess. Grab a conveniently placed Katana and start slashing away at your foes.

This game was made for the 20 Second Game Jam:

https://itch.io/jam/20-second-game-jam

Credits:

ChunkyPotatoSoup (Programming)

TETRIS (Music)

DeanAbadPixels (Art)

LuxyHugs (Mechanics/Design)

Check out the OST:

https://soundcloud.com/tup2-125912268/sets/clicktana-ost
